remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加了权限已作为相同类型的权限是否存在于，新的权限是现有的权限对象和指定的权限对象的并集。If a permission of the same type as the added permission already exists in the , the new permission is the union of the existing permission object and the specified permission object. 例如，如果实现的权限添加到 ，生成的联合是原始`Unrestricted` 。For example, if a permission that implements is added to an , the resulting union is the original `Unrestricted`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将权限添加到权限集。The following code example shows the use of the method to add a permission to a permission set. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 声明调用代码能够通过调用此方法的代码，访问受权限请求保护的资源，即使未对堆栈中处于较高位置的调用方授予访问该资源的权限。

span.span: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

summary.span: 使用 会产生安全漏洞。

span.span: Using can create security vulnerabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是唯一的方法，以在同一时间范围内声明多个权限，因为只有一个可以处于活动状态的帧。This is the only way to assert multiple permissions at the same time within a frame because only one can be active on a frame. 仅授予的权限有效。 is only effective for granted permissions. 调用或方法可取消某个活动。Call the or method to cancel an active . > [!CAUTION] > 因为调用方法移除调用链中的所有代码的要求必须被授予访问指定的资源的权限，它可以打开安全漏洞，如果使用不当。Because calling the method removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security vulnerabilities if used incorrectly or inappropriately. 因此，它应非常小心地使用。Therefore, it should be used with great caution.

exception.span: 尚未向断言的 实例授予断言代码。

span.span: The instance asserted has not been granted to the asserting code.
-or-

exception.span: 已存在一个用于当前帧的活动的 。

span.span: There is already an active for the current frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed
abstract member Demand : unit -> unit override this.Demand : unit -> unit

summary.span: 如果尚未向调用堆栈中的所有较高位置调用方授予由当前实例指定的权限，则在运行时强制引发 。

span.span: Forces a at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permissions specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用上以确保所有调用方与一个操作组中具有所有权限。Use on a to ensure that all callers have all permissions in the set with one operation. 调用此方法的代码的权限不会检查;检查开始从该代码的直接调用方，并且在堆栈中向上继续进行。The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此的调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 仅当没有引发。 succeeds only if no is thrown. 如果包含不是继承的权限，则`Demand`以及调用方法的这些权限。If the contains permissions that do not inherit from , the `Demand` methods of those permissions are called as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来请求权限集中的所有权限。The following code example shows the use of the method to demand all the permissions in a permission set. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CPP/permissionset.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CS/permissionset.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/VB/permissionset.vb#4)]

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方没有所需的权限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have the permission demanded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deny() cil managed
abstract member Deny : unit -> unit override this.Deny : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Deny is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 导致通过与当前 中所含类型的权限具有交集的权限的调用代码的任何 失败。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for a permission that has an intersection with a permission of a type contained in the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会阻止调用堆栈中的高级调用方通过调用此方法的代码访问受保护的资源，即使这些调用方已被授予权限来访问它。This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此的调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 可以限制程序员的责任或帮助防止出现意外的安全漏洞，因为它有助于防止调用的方法被用来访问被拒绝的权限所保护的资源。 can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security vulnerabilities because it helps prevent the method that calls from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission. 如果一个方法调用对权限，并且如果的调用堆栈中较低级别的调用方调用该权限，该安全检查失败时达到。If a method calls on a permission, and if a for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check fails when it reaches the . 将忽略无法成功对该权限请求，因为未授予的权限。 is ignored for a permission that is not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed.

exception.span: 对 的前一次调用已经限制当前堆栈帧的权限。

span.span: A previous call to has already restricted the permissions for the current stack frame.

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因此，不应使用的哈希代码来比较两个相同的权限集的两个实例的哈希代码可能会有所不同，对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission set might be different, so a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.PermissionSet Intersect(class System.Security.PermissionSet other) cil managed
Public Function Intersect (other As PermissionSet) As PermissionSet

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前 相交的权限集。

span.span: A permission set to intersect with the current .

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限集，该权限集是当前 和指定 的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission set that is the intersection of the current and the specified .

returns.span: 一个新权限集，表示当前 与指定目标的交集。

span.span: A new permission set that represents the intersection of the current and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此对象为 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限集的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限集。The intersection of two permission sets is a permission set that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具体而言，它表示的最低权限，这样的任何请求都会通过这两个权限设置还传递它们的交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions such that any demand that passes both permission sets also passes their intersection. 对于每个类型的两个集合中存在的权限，这些权限的两个实例都将使用的权限`Intersect`方法; 因此，生成的权限包含在生成。For each type of permission that is present in both sets, the two instances of those permissions are intersected using the permission's `Intersect` method; the resulting permission is included in the resulting . 在结果集中不存在的唯一一种方法的两个集的权限类型。Permission types that exist in only one of the two sets are excluded from the resulting set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CPP/permissionset.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CS/permissionset.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.PermissionSet#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/VB/permissionset.vb#12)]

returns.span: 如果 为空，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is empty; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可以为空，并且如果这些权限在完全受限制状态尚未包含实例的权限。A can be empty and yet contain instances of permissions if those permissions are in the fully-restricted state. 权限处于完全受限状态如果他们`IsSubsetOf`方法返回`true`时`null`作为参数传递。Permissions are in a fully restricted state if their `IsSubsetOf` methods return `true` when `null` is passed as a parameter.

returns.span: 如果当前 是 参数的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个为目标的子集如果所有要求，对于都成功也成功都完成的目标。A is a subset of the target if all demands that succeed for the also succeed for the target. 也就是说，目标至少包含的子集中包含的权限。That is, the target contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PermitOnly() cil managed
abstract member PermitOnly : unit -> unit override this.PermitOnly : unit -> unit

summary.span: 导致所有经过调用代码以请求不是当前 的子集的任何 的 失败。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for any that is not a subset of the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类似于，同时会导致堆栈审核失败时它们原本应该成功。 is similar to , in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed. 不同之处在于指定将导致失败，则堆栈审核的权限，但指定唯一的权限，但不会导致堆栈审核失败。The difference is that specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail. 调用此方法，以确保你的代码可以用于访问指定的资源。Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources. 将忽略不授予，因为无法成功对该权限请求的权限。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed. 但是，如果在调用的低级代码堆栈更高版本调用对该权限堆栈遍历到达尝试调用的代码时引发。However, if code lower on the call stack later calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 这是因为该调用的代码未被授予权限，即使它调用对该权限。This is because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it called for that permission. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此的调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.IPermission RemovePermission(class System.Type permClass) cil managed
Public Function RemovePermission (permClass As Type) As IPermission

param.name: permClass
param.span: 要删除的权限类型。

span.span: The type of permission to delete.

summary.span: 从集中删除某一类型的权限。

span.span: Removes a permission of a certain type from the set.

returns.span: 从集中删除了的权限。

span.span: The permission removed from the set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不能删除不受限制的权限集的权限。You cannot remove permissions from an unrestricted permission set. 权限集仍然不受限制的后你尝试删除的权限，并且不引发异常。The permission set remains unrestricted after you attempt to remove the permission, and an exception is not thrown. 下面的 C# 代码尝试删除从`FullTrust`设置权限，但不是删除权限。The following C# code attempts to remove the from the `FullTrust` permission set, but the permission is not removed. ``` PolicyLevel myPol = PolicyLevel.CreateAppDomainLevel(); PermissionSet myPermSet = myPol.GetNamedPermissionSet("FullTrust"); myPermSet.RemovePermission(typeof(FileIOPermission)); ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来删除从一个权限集。The following code example shows the use of the method to remove a from a permission set. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果是，表示由当前的所有操作表示由指定的所有操作以及。The result of a call to is a that represents all the operations represented by the current as well as all the operations represented by the specified . 如果设置为`Unrestricted`，联合是`Unrestricted`也。If either set is `Unrestricted`, the union is `Unrestricted` as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
